Não posso acreditar que gastei 1.214 horas da minha vida nisso.

If you enjoy inflicting emotional pain on yourself, this is just the right game for you!

Placements used to require 10 rounds, now you play 1 damn game and you're ranked!

It's fairly common to face Global Elite smurfs from Silver 2.

The matchmaking system in this game is REKT beyond the point of redemption. 

All those are coming from a guy that started playing CS in 1.3. I was 12. I'm 28 now. I've played through 1.3, 1.6, Cond. Zero, Source, and now more than 1000 hours in this game. Kinda hurts to see a really good franchise go absolutely down the drain, just because they don't want casuals to experience 10  placement matches, and step right into the comp after 2 games. Too bad.
